name: gitbook_regexp_2
description: ##为何要用正则? 正则表达式是为了专门解决文本的两个问题而产生的：

scripts.git-push-master: git checkout master && git add --all && git commit -m 'source files update' && git push origin master
scripts.git-push-gh-pages: gitbook build && git checkout gh-pages && cp -r _book/* . && git add --all && git commit -m 'new build' && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout master
scripts.deploy: npm run git-push-master && npm run git-push-gh-pages

author: zilong-thu
